data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Pingxiang, Jiangxi, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pingxiang, Jiangxi, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Pingxiang, Jiangxi, China that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 337,952, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Pingxiang. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Han Chinese, Shaozhou people might believe through him.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Pingxiang, Jiangxi, China a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 372,200 citizens of the the county of Pingxiang.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.section_summary:
the county of Pingxiang, Jiangxi, China has a population of 372,200.

We estimate Pingxiang has 28,236 people who might know Jesus, 6,013 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 337,952 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 28,236 believers find a person of peace today among the 343,965 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
